I don't know why somebody else's marriage has anything to do with me. I'm completely comfortable with gay marriage."
 
 --Elizabeth Edwards, wife of Democratic presidential candidate, John Edwards, as quoted in the San Francisco Chronicle

The fact that she's straight shouldn't (in theory) make her support surprising. Those who fight for gay rights have justice and fairness on their side; anyone who supports those concepts ought to support gay rights.

 She certainly makes Anne Coulter look like a nasty witch. OH, that's right, Anne Coulter is a nasty witch.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Straight Support
